name: Secrets For Taking - Demo (Part 1)
description:
Secrets For Taking is a game about, well, taking one's darkest and deepest secret.

Do you think you can take the Greatest Secret!?
Do you think you can save this before time runs out?

After a strange encounter, Mash is put into a situation where he must traverse through a mysterious world with the mission to take the greatest secret there ever is! ...However, someone wants to make sure he can't achieve this. A rampant Magic-User is planning to do something—that if fulfilled—will cause chaotic and reality-breaking chaos!

Mash, and some allies that join later, will have to work to persevere and succeed...! You'll have to take a lot of secrets and—perhaps—save the world?

So do you think that...
You can take everyone's secret?
